column1: The Purple Pig////Don't come "hangrey" because there is a wait
column2: yes even on the weekdays at 1pm. We waited about 45mins
column3: they send you a text once your table is ready so you can go walk or shop around. Many things to do nearby. The busser brings you water
column4: the waiter takes your order and the food arrives as it's made vs. all together. The fried pig ears were great
column5: the milk braised pork was fantastic
column6: fell right off of the bone. The broccoli was my personal favorite. The texture
column8: a little salty but but sweet. The octopus was tender and very delicious. Honestly we ordered way too much food for 2 people but it was worth it. Two thumbs up!
